= Details =

To use in your android activity:

  * Get your locale
     _mCurLocale = this.getResources().getConfiguration().locale;_

  * Set up your I18nTranslator Instance
     _mI18Translator = new I18nTranslator(mCurLocale.getLanguage());_

  * Translate your String auto-magically
     _String text = mI18Translator.translateString("Please enter correct keys to unlock.");_

  * Translate your Android Resource String auto-magically
     _String text = mTranslator.translateString(getString(R.string.menu_feedback);_
